docs.snippet: A writer explores our preoccupation with the apocalypse — and general catastrophe (and survival).

headline.main: Why Are We So Obsessed With the End of the World?

docs.snippet: Acceptance into all eight Ivy League schools is no easier than it used to be, experts say. Social media simply enables students to trumpet the feat.

headline.print_headline: The Ivy League Sweep: Still Rare, but You’re More Likely to Hear About It
headline.main: The Ivy League Sweep: Still Rare, but You’re More Likely to Hear About It

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

headline.main: Emmanuel Macron, Michael Flynn, Syria: Your Tuesday Briefing

docs.snippet: Eighteen Penn State students have been charged in the death of a sophomore: a case that, not so long ago, might have resulted only in hand-wringing.

headline.print_headline: In Shift, Prosecutors Are Taking a Tougher Stance in Fraternity Hazing Deaths
headline.main: Prosecutors Taking Tougher Stance in Fraternity Hazing Deaths

docs.snippet: President Trump arrived home Saturday to face reports that his son-in-law is under scrutiny in inquiries into possible ties between Russia and associates of Mr. Trump.

headline.print_headline: President Faces Growing Crisis On Russia Ties
headline.main: Trump Returns to Crisis Over Kushner as White House Tries to Contain It

docs.snippet: A day after Twitter sued to block a summons seeking information about who was behind an anonymous account, the federal government withdrew the summons.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Drops Order Demanding Twitter Unmask an Anti-Trump Account
headline.main: U.S. Blinks in Clash With Twitter; Drops Order to Unmask Anti-Trump Account

docs.snippet: Two premieres in London put foreboding at center stage.

headline.print_headline: Giving ‘The Philanthropist’ an Infusion of Youth
headline.main: Giving ‘The Philanthropist’ an Infusion of Youth

docs.snippet: At his restaurant in NoMad, the chef builds excitement out of banchan, the little plates that usually come free.

headline.print_headline: Where the Extras Claim the Spotlight
headline.main: The Extras Are the Stars on the Korean Menu at Atoboy

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know at the end of the day.

headline.main: Syria, Neil Gorsuch, Don Rickles: Your Thursday Evening Briefing

docs.snippet: Following years of rumors, Nigeria confirmed that 82 girls who had been taken were released. But many parents still had no idea if their daughters were among them.

headline.print_headline: After Boko Haram Releases 82 Girls, Parents Wait in Anguish
headline.main: After Boko Haram Releases Nigerian Girls, an Anguished Wait for Parents
